scripts.ts-build: npm run ts-compile && npm run ts-lint
scripts.create-db-server: docker run --name ts-poc-postgres --hostname ts-poc-postgres --network ts-poc -p 5432:5432 -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=p@ssw0rd -d postgres:10.5 && sleep 5
scripts.create-db: docker run -it --rm --network ts-poc -e PGPASSWORD=p@ssw0rd postgres:10.5 psql -h ts-poc-postgres -U postgres -c 'create database tspocdb;'
scripts.create-db-tables: docker run -it --rm --network ts-poc -v $(pwd):/www -w /www node:8 /bin/bash -c 'rm -rf node_modules && npm install && npm run ts-build && node ./src/data/db-script.js'
scripts.db-docker-start: npm run create-db-server && npm run create-db && npm run create-db-tables
scripts.db-docker-stop: docker stop ts-poc-postgres && docker rm ts-poc-postgres
scripts.dev: npm run ts-compile-watch & npm run nodemon
scripts.dev-docker-start: docker run -it --rm --name ts-poc-api --hostname ts-poc-api --network ts-poc -p 4000:4000 -v $(pwd):/www -w /www node:8 /bin/bash -c 'rm -rf node_modules && npm install && npm run dev'
scripts.dev-docker-stop: docker stop ts-poc-api && docker rm ts-poc-api
